row.process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_JSN_OUTPUT# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &UC4RB_JSN_OUTPUT# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JSN_OUTPUT#,,"WORKFLOW" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_TMP_FILE :ENDIF
